requirements_placeholder: Describe the functionality for which test cases are needed...
custom_prompt_placeholder_example: Example: Generate detailed test cases for the following functionality: {requirements_text}. Include positive and negative scenarios.
no_test_cases_found: No test cases found or could not be generated.
error_no_input: Please enter requirements text or upload a PDF file.
error_text_too_long_5000: Requirements text must not exceed 5000 characters.
footer_text: Â©2025 Test-case Generator. All rights reserved.
backend_error_invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Please upload a PDF.
backend_error_pdf_extraction_failed: Failed to extract text from PDF or PDF is empty.
backend_error_no_input_provided: Requirements text or a PDF file must be provided.
backend_error_input_empty: Input data for generation is empty.
backend_error_gemini_text_response_faile: Failed to get text response from Gemini.
backend_error_gemini_empty_response: Gemini API returned an empty response.
backend_error_gemini_request_blocked: Request blocked due to safety settings: {category}. Try modifying the text.
backend_error_gemini_key_invalid: Gemini API key error. Please check your key.
backend_error_gemini_timeout: Timeout when contacting Gemini API. Please try again later.
backend_error_parsing_failed: Could not parse test cases from AI response. Try changing the prompt or requirements.
